title: Creators of Tailwind laid off 75% of their engineering team
author: kevlened
aiHeadline: Tailwind CSS creators lay off 75% of their engineering team, proving that even the best tools can't save you from a stylish disaster.

title: Sugar industry influenced researchers and blamed fat for CVD (2016)
author: aldarion
aiHeadline: Sugar industry paid researchers to blame fat for heart disease, because nothing says 'I love you' like a sweet, healthy heart.

title: US will ban Wall Street investors from buying single-family homes
author: kpw94
aiHeadline: US government bans Wall Street investors from buying single-family homes, because clearly, the solution to housing shortages is to let regular folks buy them instead.

title: Eat Real Food
author: atestu
aiHeadline: Government website tells you to 'Eat Real Food,' because nothing says 'we're in charge' like giving advice that's as helpful as a paper fan in a fire.

title: Shipmap.org
author: surprisetalk
aiHeadline: Shipmap.org lets you track every ship in the ocean, because nothing says 'privacy' like knowing where every cargo ship is at all times.
